arts.ttl: Jarrod Bowen clashes with fan after West Ham knocked out of Carabao Cup by Wolves
arts.sum: West Ham captain Jarrod Bowen was involved in a heated clash with a frustrated fan after his side were knocked out of the Carabao Cup by Wolves on Tuesday evening.

arts.ttl: Carabao Cup roundup: Wolves’ Strand Larsen stuns West Ham while Huddersfield upset Sunderland
arts.sum: West Ham captain Bowen apologises to fans for reaction League One Huddersfield advance after penalty shootout Two goals in three minutes from wanted man Jørgen Strand Larsen completed a stirring Wolves comeback as they beat West Ham 3-2 in the Carabao Cup second round. The Norwegian striker, a transfer target for Newcastle, stepped off the bench to provide a pair of unstoppable finishes eight and six minutes from time to get Molineux rocking. Continue reading...

Bowen crossed from the right and Paqueta was left free - between Agbadou and Mosquera - to head home. Jhon Arias had a shot saved first before Jackson Tchatchoua crossed for Larsen to head home at the near post and send Molineux and the Wolves dugout into raptures.

arts.ttl: Jorgen Strand Larsen’s late brace sees Wolves beat West Ham in Carabao Cup
arts.sum: The Norwegian striker stepped off the bench to provide a pair of unstoppable finishes eight and six minutes from time.

arts.ttl: Goodbye gift? Strand Larsen double damns West Ham in five-goal EFL Cup thriller
arts.sum: Jorgen Strand Larsen inspires Wolverhampton Wanderers to a 3-2 EFL Cup victory over West Ham United on Tuesday amidst reports of a potential transfer to Newcastle United.

arts.ttl: Jorgen Strand Larsen’s late brace sees Wolves beat West Ham in Carabao Cup
arts.sum: The Norwegian striker stepped off the bench to provide a pair of unstoppable finishes eight and six minutes from time.

arts.ttl: Wolves 3 – 2 West Ham United | Beaten by second string Wolves XI
arts.sum: Let’s deal with the elephant in the room first. What kind of team was that to send out in a knock-out competition. One attacker. one attacking midfielder. West Ham setting up to play for penalties? Or did Graham Potter really think what turned out to be a line of nine defenders at some stages- was […] Source

arts.ttl: Strand Larsen turns tie around for Wolves to add to West Ham woe
arts.sum: Jorgen Strand Larsen came off the bench to score twice as Wolves came from behind to beat West Ham 3-2 in the Carabao Cup as Graham Potter suffers defeat again.

arts.ttl: Wolves v West Ham United – Potter reveals starting XI for Carabao Cup encounter
arts.sum: West Ham have travelled up to the Black Country for a Carabao Cup tie with Wolves on the back of two awful Premier League season-opening fixtures. Eight goals conceded so far. A newly signed goal keeper under torrents of criticism, along with the defence in front of him. Graham Potter desperately needs a win – […] Source

arts.ttl: Liam Keen advises Vitor Pereira on tough Wolves decision ahead of West Ham
arts.sum: Liam Keen says Vitor Pereira should start Hugo Bueno against West Ham In the latest episode of the E&S Wolves podcast, Keen reveals his thoughts on Pereira’s left wing-back options, saying: “I did ask Vitor about it after the game as well, and he said they’re two different players, Wolfe and Bueno.
